H0.text: what does david beckham play. Defender

H1.text: what does david beckham play. Forward

H2.text: what does david beckham play. Winger

H3.text: what does david beckham play. Midfielder

A4.text: Primarily a right midfielder and known for his range of passing, crossing ability and set-piece taking

A5.text: predominantly right-footed, his range of passing, vision, crossing ability and bending free-kicks enabled him to create chances for teammates or score goals, attributes that saw him excel as a right winger
